(Simplified: 钏)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 川 indicates the sound; 釒 (metal) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 釒 [ jīn ] gold, metal; money
    • 川 [ chuān ] stream, river
①用珠子或玉石等穿起來做成的鐲子：金釧。玉釧。
(Simplified: 钏)

Pictophonetic: 川 indicates the sound; 釒 (metal) conveys the meaning.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning bracelet.

English senses 英语理解:

Usage example 用法举例: 手釧 shǒu chuàn (bracelet)

釧字的基本解释

釧
chuàn
见“钏”。

釧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chuàn］
［《廣韻》尺絹切，去線，昌。］
“钏1”的繁体字。
(1)臂镯的古称。
(2)姓。明有钏国贤。见《万姓统谱·霰韵》。

釧字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　釧； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1296第17
【唐韻】尺絹切【韻會】【正韻】樞絹切，?音竁。【說文】臂環也。【玉篇】釵釧。【正字通】古男女同用，今惟女飾有之。【何偃·與謝尚書】珍玉名釧，因物寄情。【庾信·竹杖賦】玉關寄書，章臺留釧。【墨莊漫錄】唐文宗問宰臣，金條脫何物。宰臣未對。文宗曰：古詩：輕衫穩條脫，卽今臂釧也，別作玔。　又姓。【萬姓統譜】萬曆閒，撫州照磨釧國賢，閬中人。貴陽縣丞釧佩，雲南人。　又【類篇】昌緣切，音穿。車釧。

Kushiro
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chuàn］
["Guangyun" ruler silk cut, remove the thread, Chang. ]
"钏1" in traditional characters.
(1) The ancient name of the arm bracelet.
(2) Last name. There is Kushiro Guoxian in the Ming Dynasty. See "Wan Xing Tong Pu·Hai Yun".
Kushiro
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　 Chuan; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 1296 Page 17
[Tang Yun] Ruler silk cut [Rhyme will] [Zheng Yun] hinge silk cut,? Yin condyle. [Said the text] Armbands too. [Jade articles] Hairpin. [Zhengzitong] Used by both men and women in ancient times, but now it is decorated by women. 【He Yan·And Xie Shangshu】The name of a precious jade is Chuan. 【Xin Yu·Fu of Zhuzhang】The book was sent to Yuguan, and Chuan was left at Zhangtai. [Manual Records of Mozhuang] Tang Wenzong asked the princes, what are the gold bars off? The prince was wrong. Wen Zong said: Ancient poems: Take off the light shirt and take it off.　Another last name. [Wan Xing Genealogy] Wanlixian, Fuzhou Zhaomo Chuan Guoxian, Langzhong. Cheng Chuanpei, Guiyang County, from Yunnan.　[Classes] Chang Yuan cuts, sound wears. Che Chuan.
